You will feel very cramped and caged in by the end of the first day. There was no A/C, only a cheap motel window fan that was loud and did not cool the room down at all. We had to open the windows. After one night, we requested a larger room or a suite. The frontdesk referred us to the hotel manager who never called back. When we were leaving we asked for a Bell Hop to assist us and after waiting 20 minutes we ended up dragging our stuff down and through the lobby (the bell hops were just standing there doing nothing!). The location near the wharf and the Sheraton reputation may qualify it to be a 4-star hotel but the luxury, the quality, and the comfort were all severely lacking.

review.title: Nice place to stay.....
review.reviewText: The room was clean, The bed was one of the most comfortable I'd slept in. Good location for wharf activities. Employees were very pleasant.

review.title: If you like ants (4 star?)
review.reviewText:
We had ants on the table in the room when we called maintenance they killed the ants by smashing them and then left them on the table. We reported this and it took 3 days for them to finally clean them up. 

Also they charge $32 per day for parking. If we knew this we would have choose a different hotel

review.title: Not what we expected
review.reviewText: This is an old hotel and even though they are trying to work on the outside of the building, it is not what my husband and I would consider a 4-star hotel.  They have the old heaters in the rooms.  The bed was very comfy, though--that is probably the best bed I've slept on that is not my own!  The in-room check out didn't work and the conceirge gave us inaccurate information about going to Alcatraz--he said we'd have to go wait in a stand-by line starting at 6 am til they opened at 8:45, but when we talked to the wrokers where you buy the tickets, they said to be in line at about 8:20.  We were glad we followed the worker's advice and not the conceirge's.  Overall, we wouldn't choose to stay at this particular Sheraton hotel again.

review.title: Great location at the Wharf
review.reviewText: Hotel was under renovation. Exterior had scaffolding, interior was nice.  Beds were very comfortable and rooms spacious.

review.title: A nice place to stay
review.reviewText: The food in the hotel resturant was superb.  The only thing wrong with the room was it had ants.  Don't like bugs in my hotel room

review.title: Very impressed with Sheraton's quality service
review.reviewText: I had a very good experience staying at Sheraton. This is the first time I tried Sheraton; all I can say is that its better than all my previous stays.

review.title: We had a great time.
review.reviewText: I only had two complaints.  The hotel gift shop closed an hour earlier than the posted closing time, which severely inconvenienced me (I needed medicine, had kids I couldn't leave to go to a drug store, etc.) and housekeeping rang my room despite my Do Not Disturb on the door, which woke the kids from their nap.  Otherwise, great hotel.  The bellmen and front desk clerks went above and beyond the call of duty to meet my requests.  The hotel was very clean and quiet.

review.title: Not impressed
review.reviewText: Very dingy and dirty.  Wouldn't grant request to be moved to non-smoking room.

review.title: Great Location
review.reviewText: The first room we were assigned was very small and on the first floor of the hotel, which I thought to be a terrible room assignment as we were scheduled to stay for a total of 5 days.  However, we were given a room upgrade and the reassignment was great.  The bed was comfortable, the linens very clean and in overall great condition.  I would however recommend to the hotel to perhaps purify the air as there was sort of a stale cigarette odor.

review.title: Sheraton Fisherman's Wharf - San Francisco
review.reviewText: Our stay at this hotel was outstanding. The staff at the Sheraton on Fisherman's Wharf could not do enough for us. Anything you need or even think you might need is taken care of immediately with a SMILE. Housekeeping staff are outstanding. We hope to make another visit to SF and will surely stay at this Sheraton again.
